snippet: Anthony Ervin completed a strong weekend at the Arena Grand Prix in Charlotte, N.C., by defeating a competitive field in the 100-meter freestyle.
abstract: American swimmer Anthony Ervin completes strong weekend at Arena Grand Prix in Charlotte, NC, defeating competitive field in 100-meter freestyle.
lead_paragraph: Anthony Ervin completed a strong weekend at the Arena Grand Prix in Charlotte, N.C., by defeating a competitive field in the 100-meter freestyle.
